Job Name (Unique Key): # The name for the Job, will store in folder with this name
Path Monitoring: The path to monitor file changes
Monitoring File System Signiture: The UUID > Label > Path for the monitoring path
Minium snapshot time: The check interval for the script about content change.
Vault Path: The Path to store the version history vault
Keep 1 Compelete Backup: When vault is empty, copy entire monitorig path to vault instead of using links
Only Sync Attributes (permissions): Do not backup file content upon attr change
Keep N versions: How many max versions of the file to keep in vault
Backup Size Limit: Keep purging old versions until 1 left if vault size exceed this limit
Vault File System Signiture: The UUID > Label > path for the vault file system

Job Name (Unique Key): # need to be unique for path distinction
Monitoring File System Signiture: will auto record if not set, use string literal N/A if does not care about FS ( can be inefficient )
Minium snapshot time: Will only backup upon X seconds of inactivity
Keep 1 Compelete Backup: If true, can take long to initialize / fail to initialize if backup space is small
Only Sync Attributes (permissions): If true, file attr change will get synced to the most recent file backup
Backup Size Limit: Maybe inaccurate on CoW File systems. Use 0 for infinity, % numbers refer to disk usage %
Vault File System Signiture: Will auto record if not set, use string literal N/A if does not care about FS
